query:
UPDATE services 
SET features = JSON_SET(features, '$[0]', '1-day delivery') 
WHERE name LIKE '%Cover Letter%' 
AND JSON_EXTRACT(features, '$[0]') LIKE '%day%delivery%';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ijVUtDru4Z9cqPT.98f765e38313 --database YeXpL2RbTVxqVQqhWQzraf --execute UPDATE services 
SET features = JSON_SET(features, '$[0]', '1-day delivery') 
WHERE name LIKE '%Cover Letter%' 
AND JSON_EXTRACT(features, '$[0]') LIKE '%day%delivery%';
